LanguageData.CookFreezeMochi10.label: Frozen mochi(10)
LanguageData.CookFreezeMochi10.description: Make a frozen mochi that can be stored for a long time by soaking mochis in water and freezing it, then drying it with cold air.

LanguageData.CookFreezeMochi100.description: Make a frozen mochi that can be stored for a long time by soaking mochis in water and freezing it, then drying it with cold air.Make a freeze dried mochi that can be stored for a long time by soaking mochis in water and freezing it, then drying it with cold air.

LanguageData.CookFermentedSoybeans10.label: Natto(10)
LanguageData.CookFermentedSoybeans10.description: Wrapping soybeans in straw to create a traditional Japanese dish of fermented soybeans. Some would eat this for breakfast as a type of cereal.
